question: Who has launched an online application system for music auditions for the All India Radio (AIR)?
explanation: Prasar Bharati Chairman A Surya Prakash has launched an online application system for music auditions for the All India Radio (AIR) due to the occasion of 64th Akashvani Sangeet Sammelan. AIR expected to arrange the auditions in different genres of music like classical, light, folk, tribal and western.
